DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine relationship personal life mean purpose physical activity maintenance group previously sedentary adult start new exercise program . Participants complete questionnaire baseline , 4 week , 12 week start exercise program . Participants randomly assign complete questionnaire daily meaning , mood , activity first 4 week complete 8 random questionnaire daily activity first 4 week . It hypothesize personal life mean purpose relate great exercise participation 12 week .
DOC.criteria: 3089 year old Joining already member Anschutz Health Wellness Fitness Center Able read understand English Sedentary ( < 60 minute moderatevigorous physical activity week ) past 3 month Planning start new exercise program Physical contraindication participate physical activity ( define positive PARQ score ) Existing diagnosis cardiovascular disease Currently pregnant
